website_summaries.verdict: Slow-pitch softball that delivers a maximum distance for hitters.
pros: High-quality softball construction with a design that overcomes flight problems other softballs suffer in summer heat
Flat seams work well for slow-pitch players
cons: Build quality is questionable as some balls flatten

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product shipped.
customer_reviews.text: Wrong product was shipped. Shipped a dozen USSSA balls. Bad part is we needed balls for league play the week they arrived. Had no choice but to use them. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Collins

customer_reviews.title: Maximum satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: I put one down for the quantity and got 1 dozen. Sounds like a lot of people were having issues with that before, they must have fixed the problem. REAL LEATHER and great ball. Just used for the first time last night and killed the ball. These balls are HOT, never buying another brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Spend 70$+ for 1 session of BP
customer_reviews.text: After one session of BP, six out of the twelve balls are ruined. Hard to understand how they have such a high rating, the leather on these balls is like a piece of paper.
customer_reviews.author: Lonewolfpackman

customer_reviews.title: WRONG BALLS
customer_reviews.text: Got 12 balls but not one was a evil ball 10 of the 12 are USSSA balls and 2 are training balls I would recommend u buy from evilsports.com. you will then get what u pay for
customer_reviews.author: Kale Family

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love these balls. They hold up well and when pitching in hot humid weather they still have a good feel to them.
customer_reviews.author: DSloan

customer_reviews.title: Good ball.
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality. Price is little high, but you get what you pay for. Try to catch them on sale.
customer_reviews.author: JDog

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Held up perfectly for a tournament and even got a couple HRs myself!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly what I wanted to use in my softball league thanks
customer_reviews.author: Gary G

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra $$
customer_reviews.text: A little more expensive than other softballs, but I think it's worth it. These softballs have a lot of pop, and don't go "dead" easily.
customer_reviews.author: R-Dub

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these ones!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy, I literally took them out yesterday and at least half cracked already I'm extremely disappointed I'm giving it 2 stars because some balls are good but others were just horrible I want a replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan l.

customer_reviews.title: Good balls while they lasted!
customer_reviews.text: Price does not match durability, should be $40 dollars or less a dozen
customer_reviews.author: Dana Ramer

customer_reviews.title: Seam irregularities
customer_reviews.text: About half of the balls had seam irregularities. They will get the job done but for the price paid it doesn't seem right.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Great men's balls for slow pitch rec league
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering these balls for my ASA adult slow pitch co-ed league (men's balls). Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to use in our work softball league. They are true and balanced, and really seem to take wear and tear. In fact, our only problem with them is that the other teams keep trying to walk off with them. All in all, excellent ball.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Wade

customer_reviews.title: A solid buy..
customer_reviews.text: So far these have stayed solid and have not deformed. I like them and have recommended these balls to others.
customer_reviews.author: Mox

customer_reviews.title: Best softballs on the market to date
customer_reviews.text: Best softballs on the market to date. Won't buy any other brand of softballs but these. Hit the farthest fly the farthest.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I buy these every year for my softball league. No complaints thus far!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Balls!
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for our company softball tournament. We will use these again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Houston Doll

customer_reviews.title: HOT!
customer_reviews.text: These balls got mashed out of the box. Wish I could find all of the dingers cuz losing $7-8 a pop sucks. Still bought more. HOT!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Only received one ball when the description says a dozen
customer_reviews.author: Deano

customer_reviews.title: Only received one ball
customer_reviews.text: Will be returning item I only received one ball even though the description says a dozen. Looking at the questions this seems to be a common issue.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon W.

customer_reviews.title: Evil softball for asa
customer_reviews.text: Balls seem to be consistent in the way they come off the bat
customer_reviews.author: Rich Nourie

customer_reviews.title: Only Balls I Like!
customer_reviews.text: These slow pitch softballs are hands down the best on the market. Hit better and fly farther than anything else out there.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good softballs, love the stitching. Seem to work better when it's warm out than cold.
customer_reviews.author: Gusto181

customer_reviews.title: Great softball
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered the case for use in a weekend Men's Tournament using ASA bats. we have quite a few heavy hitters on the team, using a range of bats like the juggy, aftermath, and z4000. We played 9 games and I only used 6 of the balls. They all held up great and will still be used for BP throughout the season. Any complaints people have about these balls come from defects or unrealistic standards.
customer_reviews.author: MandaK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Balls held up well all tourney, will be using these when we play ASA.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: great softballs
customer_reviews.text: Like it says they are the hottest 52/300 out there
customer_reviews.author: Chris Holland

customer_reviews.title: Good Go To Ball!
customer_reviews.text: I will say I like the X rocks better, but this s a great ball. We have them for practice and use them in games too. With a HOT bat, very good ball. The 52 300 is hard to hit long distances and this ball flies well and comes off the bat well.
customer_reviews.author: Vol4Life

customer_reviews.title: These balls are good for your beer league slow pitch softball games and ...
customer_reviews.text: These balls are good for your beer league slow pitch softball games and practice nice pop off the bats, they are bright and easy to see and they look cool. im giving 4 stars because there were 2 balls that had minor splitting in the first two week i have had them. even though they have split they are still good for practices. i would repurchase them.
customer_reviews.author: Sam b14

customer_reviews.title: Best Option
customer_reviews.text: These are obviously the more pricey of the options available when it comes to softballs but I've never had any problems with them and they seem to travel further and last longer than others.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: So-so balls. Not flying out of the park
customer_reviews.text: These balls don't seem as hot as some others we have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Mills

customer_reviews.title: Trump's Evil Balls
customer_reviews.text: They're evil. I wasn't exactly expecting them to be THIS evil. Written on each ball is "Trump" much to the chagrin of my softball team full of park rangers. Good build quality overall, and the putrid name on the ball inspired my team to hit them harder.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Wie

customer_reviews.title: Wet socks
customer_reviews.text: Ball is like hitting a wet sock. New balls should feel good coming off the bat for at least a couple weeks
customer_reviews.author: SHANE R DOXZON

customer_reviews.title: Junk Balls
customer_reviews.text: These balls are junk, I bought a dozen and over half broke right at the seams. Played the other night and hit one and it mashed one whole side in and it was a ball that had been hit just in that game. Very disappointed and unhappy about paying for a dozen balls and none of them are good anymore. Junk and will never buy Evil balls again
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Wehner

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the order quantity
customer_reviews.text: While I did receive an evil softball... It was not the dozen I ordered... I hope to hell this single ball is worth $75...
customer_reviews.author: alan snow

customer_reviews.title: Did not expect anything good out of something named Trump
customer_reviews.text: Did not expect anything good out of something named Trump, but this has far exceeded my expectations. The balls are excellent and we have a blast giving them a good whack.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Tillinghast

product_meta.title: Evil Ball 12" Evil ASA 52-300 Distance with HOT .52/300 - Dozen ASA-RP52
product_meta.description: Evil Ball 12" Evil ASA 52-300 Distance with HOT .52/300 (ASA-RP52) - Dozen
feature_bullets: Best Softball in the Hot weather

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
